ptxt.intxrefpoff: Throttle Body and Intake Manifold Components:For J20 Engine

attention2.ptxt: Never disassemble intake manifold. Disassembly will spoil its original performance. If faulty condition is found, replace it with new one.

s1.ptxt: Drain cooling system referring to Cooling System Draining:For Petrol Engine Model .
Remove air cleaner outlet hose (1) and breather hose (2).
Remove electric throttle body assembly referring to Electric Throttle Body Assembly Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine .
Disconnect the following electric lead wires:

item.ptxt: Brake booster hose (3) from intake manifold
Fuel pressure regulator vacuum hose (5) from intake manifold
Vacuum hose (6) from EVAP canister purge valve
EVAP canister purge hose (8) from EVAP canister purge valve

s1.ptxt: Remove EGR pipe bolt (9) from EGR pipe.
Remove EVAP canister purge valve bracket (10) form intake manifold.
Remove water pump and generator drive belt referring to Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt Removal and Installation (For J20 Engine):For Petrol Engine Model .
With hose connected, detach P/S pump referring to P/S Pump Removal and Installation (J20A Engine Model) .
Remove intake manifold and O-ring from cylinder head.

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure for installation noting the followings.

item.ptxt: Install intake manifold bolt (2) and nut (1) as shown in figure.
Check to ensure that all removed parts are back in place.
Reinstall any necessary parts which have not been reinstalled.
Adjust water pump and generator drive belt referring to Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt On-Vehicle Inspection (For J20 Engine):For Petrol Engine Model .
Refill cooling system referring to Cooling System Flush and Refill:For Petrol Engine Model .
Upon completion of installation, turn ignition switch ON but engine OFF and check for fuel leaks.
Finally, start engine and check for engine coolant leaks.
